TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

Docs.summary: 代表控件的数据绑定的集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 通过添加完成简单数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>。 继承自任何对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>属性。 对于支持数据绑定的控件的窗口的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>类。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>包含标准收集方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>。
为获得控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>属于中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的五个控件： 四个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件。 通过 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> 类的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> 属性来访问 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: ControlBindingsCollection(System::Windows::Forms::IBindableComponent ^ control);

Docs.param: 绑定集合所属的 。
Docs.summary: 用指定的可绑定控件初始化 类的新实例。
将 添加到集合。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (System.Windows.Forms.Binding binding);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Windows.Forms.Binding binding) cil managed
public: void Add(System::Windows::Forms::Binding ^ binding);

Docs.param: 要添加的 。
Docs.summary: 将指定的 添加到集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>的此重载所创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>时完成更改后发生的事件。
## Examples 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>实例，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加到实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>的此重载所创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A>属性。
添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>事件发生。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>方法来添加三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。 通过 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> 类的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> 属性来访问 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
